achilles.name: Achilles
achilles.description: A legendary warrior whose skill in battle is unmatched. He inspires troops to fight with greater ferocity.

passive.name: Warrior's Presence
passive.description: Increases land unit attack by 5% (+1% per level) in this city.

skills.name: Warcry
skills.description: Boosts the attack of all land units by 10% (+2% per level) for the next battle.

skills.name: Rapid Mobilization
skills.description: Reduces recruitment time in the Barracks by 15% (+1% per level) for 1 hour.

odysseus.name: Odysseus
odysseus.description: A cunning strategist known for his intellect and trickery. He excels at espionage and naval tactics.

passive.name: Cunning Mind
passive.description: Increases silver production by 10% (+1.5% per level) in this city.

skills.name: Naval Superiority
skills.description: Boosts the speed of all naval units by 15% (+1% per level) for the next battle.

skills.name: Master Spy
skills.description: Increases the effectiveness of spies by 20% (+2% per level) for 2 hours.
